title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The dynamic text element's Content Type property does not have any effect on the displayed results.
OB: When I set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report still displays the same results.
EB:
I expect the report to display different results based on the selected Content Type property. Specifically:
- For Plain, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed.
- For Auto, I expect the content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without any HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the attached report.
2. Navigate to the dynamic text element with the Content Type property.
3. Set the Content Type property to Auto.
4. Observe the displayed results.
5. Repeat steps 3 and 4 for the Plain and HTML Content Type options.
